property.name: mediadisplayblurb
property.value: U.S. service members meeting with Pakistani service members

note.text: In the Pakistan military, rank is very important. Decisions are made by very high-ranking officers. Service members may not be able to make decisions that stray from their superiors’ official positions.

When meeting with Pakistani counterparts, match your rank to theirs as closely as possible. It may be perceived as an insult to have a lower-ranking U.S. service member meet with a higher-ranking Pakistani. If matching rank isn't possible, behave respectfully to show that you recognize your counterpart’s rank.
